title: 138.96 RECORDED MUSIC CENTER.
text:
"Recorded music center" means an area in the state history center to collect recorded music produced in Minnesota which is made by Minnesota performers and composers.
The Minnesota Historical Society shall coordinate collecting activities relating to this section with other Minnesota archives and libraries.
The Minnesota Historical Society shall notify and encourage producers of music, including musical groups, to offer one copy of each recorded music item to the historical society for consideration as an addition to its collections. Items the society accepts for deposit shall be a part of the recorded music center.
